job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Job title : SRE Location : NYC Full Time Position Required Qualifications: ·         4-5 years of work experience year work experience in a DevOps or Site Reliability Engineer role. ·         Good working knowledge in production/application support ·         Good with OOP concepts and Python programming/scripting ·         Strong Computer Science fundamentals in Data Structures, Algorithms, Complexity Analysis, Object-Oriented Design and Designing Large Scale Data-Intensive Applications. ·         4+ years industry experience in Expert Knowledge in Linux, Python, Shell, JavaScript, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, Redis ·         Comfortable multi-tasking, managing multiple stakeholders and working as part of a team Preferred Qualifications: ·         Experience in ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) or Prometheus + Grafana ·         Experience with continuous deployment/delivery practices ·         AWS Certifications such as Solution Architect, DevOps Engineer ·         Experience with Container technologies like Docker, Kubernetes ·         Experience with cloud computing systems ·         Networking including TCP, HTTP, DNS, SSL certificates ·         Knowledge of Slang/SecDB is a plus
